text: The flag of Aiguafreda () is a horizontal flag, with proportions of two high by three long, with a vermella upper goal studded with white crosses, of which only 3 are whole; The lower part is composted in two identical strips, with a yellow and black lower part. The ratio of the flag is 2:3. ==References== Aiguafreda
title: Flag of Aiguafreda
